website_summaries.verdict: Sleek design, excellent range, and good speed make this RC boat a crowd-pleaser.
pros: Attractive, detailed exterior made from impact-resistant ABS
Easy, accurate controls with capsize recovery
Controller comes with LCD battery display and alarm
cons: Only comes with one rechargeable battery that has a rather short running time

customer_reviews.title: Engineer couldn't get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old bought this and saved it to use while visiting his grandpa, who is a very skilled engineer. Testing and tweaking and following all directions, they never could get it to work. Remote turned on, but the boat never gave any signs of life. By the time he opened it (for the first time), it was past the return date:( I'm going to try contacting the company and will update this if there is any positive news to report.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 boats.  Charger was NOT included in either!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two boats based upon the reviews. They are both being returned since they did NOT come with a charger that can be plugged into a wall outlet. They do make an adapter which was not in the box. Contacted the China manufacturer to purchase it separately and their response was it cannot be ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to give this remote control boat as a birthday gift. Sadly it worked great for about a minute then nosedived into the lake and when we retrieved it found that the top portion of the boat was gone and could not be found. The person we gave it to was so disappointed as were we.
customer_reviews.author: mary polovitz

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Does this thing move!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson birthday. He had a hard time getting controls from dad. Extremely fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Qaporter

customer_reviews.title: Good Design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to run and fun for the entire family to use.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Caution using this supplier
customer_reviews.text: It said battery was included but was missing when opened. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: aquaholic230

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This boat is really fun, I played in my pool after I charged it and I am gonna bring this to the lake.I had to go slow because of the size of my pool. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: testing

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it. Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comes ready to go . Charged it put it in the water and had a blast. Kids loved it. Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these. First one was great my other sons didn't work at all!! We were taking on vacation with us so by the time we got home of course it was to late to send back for a new one or a refund. Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: lana

customer_reviews.title: Works great! It sunk under the water and I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It sunk under the water and I thought it was a goner but it popped right back up!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift, just able to try it out now and does not work. Worked for 1 minute. Directions are poorly written. Now past the return window, a $50 waste.
customer_reviews.author: AlecDude3

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! It will break within 45 days!
customer_reviews.text: This boat is already broken! The battery only works for about 1 minute and alarm starts to sound that the battery will die. My son got to use this boat maybe a half dozen times if that. A complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: Boat will fill up with water
customer_reviews.text: Boat was smaller than I expected but works well. The biggest issue is if you go backwards the boat will fill up with water
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Koebel

customer_reviews.title: not the best, but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Motor overheats easily. The steering was faulty and it wouldn't turn right... had to adjust the linkage to compensate
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Rider 81

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boat and quality design!
customer_reviews.text: This remote control boat is awesome. The speed of the boat is absolutely amazing. I really like to watch it turning because it is so smoothy to do the turning stuff. Easy controls and battery lasts long. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved this and had a great time with it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this and had a great time with it. The only downside is the battery does not last long. Lasts a very few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Benita Horn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Ran for 10 minutes and now the battery won’t charge so badically spent the money for pnly 10 minutes worth of play.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: This boat was a Christmas gift an used for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This boat was a Christmas gift an used for the first time after warranty because of cold weather. The boat will not charge after second use. Charger continues to blink red always. All wires are dry. Could you help with a repair or replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kimball

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT CHARGE AFTER FIRST FEW RUNS
customer_reviews.text: This is the second remote control that I have tried to buy from amazon. The first didn't work right out of the package. This one was fun for the first few runs, but after that, it wouldn't charge any more. I have tried charging it for hours in different ways, but it has still not worked. DO NOT BUY THIS BOAT!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Utesch

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed kid here
customer_reviews.text: The boat fills with water regardless of a tight fitting cover and because of that stops working long before the battery runs out. Disappointed kid here.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for exactly 4 times. Now battery won’t charge. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This thing is way more fun than we expected
customer_reviews.text: This thing is way more fun than we expected! We thought the price was great and it seems to compare to more expensive boats out there.Great little boat fast and good battery life for a boat. About ten minutes and that's running all out most of the time.And the remote controller has full function to control the boat and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Sean_W

customer_reviews.title: LOVES it!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The child that received this boat absolutely LOVES it!!!!!!!!!!! Has a blast with it!!!!! **The only flaw was there was no info/description as to what kind/size battery for this specific boat. Amazon cust srv also tried to reach out to the co, but was unable to reach anyone. Other than that, the boat was a HUGE hit!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BellaD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boat, my kids love it and so do
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boat, my kids love it and so do the adults. Totally worth the money. The battery only last at about 8 mins, the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars, but it does come with another battery which is great but I would buy another. It does give you a warning sound when battery is running low which is nice if you are driving it on a pond that you don't want to get in too.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Baber

customer_reviews.title: Broke the very first time I used it. No water inside, just won't go full speed. They made it right and more, HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.text: The item broke the first time I used it. I had bought this to race with a friend, as he has the exact same boat. Returned the item.... But there is more.. They went above and beyond to ensure that I was satisfied, Customer Experience is the distinguishing factor these days, and they surpassed expectations. I hope that you don't encounter a concern, but rest assured if you do, they will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this (so does my husband) the only problem is that it goes so fast the pool isn't big enough. We put a stopper behind the trigger so my son had more time to react and turn.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel A Gennarelli

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Very Fast
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This boat is FAST! Bought it for an 8 year old and he had a blast with it. SO much that I am now going to order a second for his Brother. Do wish the battery life was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Forbes

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe you'd be disappointed with this one
customer_reviews.text: For those out there skeptical about a battery powered boat, I can't believe you'd be disappointed with this one. It goes quite fast and with the 2 batteries, has a nice drive time. My 11 year old son loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little boat. Tons of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the light night deal price. Batteries last a good 10 minutes and it is lots of fun with my five year old if I help him. Avoid pond Algae and weeds as it will snag the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Dezy

customer_reviews.title: Great First RC Boat
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great starter RC boat. I use it in the lake as well as a small local pond. It preforms amazing given its size. Fast enough for a first remote control boat.
customer_reviews.author: tay brown

product_meta.title: TOYEN GordVE Remote Control Boat for Lakes, Pools and Outdoor Adventure 4CH High Speed Electric RC Boat-Blue
product_meta.description:
Tips you should know: 
- Ensure the top cover tamp down tightly before running: fasten the top cover forwards and hear "dong", then button up it backwards. That indicates it is locked tightly. 
- Put on the water first and then turn on the controller, the screw propeller won't turn when it was on the land, the boat ONLY works on the water. 
- Open the top cover and remove the battery after running to ensure the inner surface of boat is dry, otherwise it will shorten the lifetime of the boat.

Specifications: 
Functions: Turn left/right, Forward/backward, 180 degrees accurate orientation 
Remote Control: 2.4GHz Wireless 150 meter distance control,free shift for right and left hand 
Remote Control Channel: 4-Channels 
Battery capacity: 7.4 V 600mah lithium battery 
Transmitter Power: 4 x 1.5V AA battery(not included) 
Playing time: 6 - 8mins 
Charging time: 45mins 
Product Size: 14.2 x 3.7 x 3.0 inches 
Package size: 14.6*11.0* 4.7 inches 
Weight: 300g

Package Contents: 
1x RC Boat 
1x Lithium battery 
1x Transmitter controller 
1x Charger 
1x User manual 
1x supporter set 
1x Lubrication tools set 
1x Spare propeller
feature_bullets: Easy to control and turn left/right/forward/backward, 180 degrees accurate orientation.
Waterproof hull with anti-tilt modular design is built from impact-resistant ABS plastic parts are easily maintained and replaced.
Unique LCD display screen transmitter which show battery capacity and automatic low battery alarm.
Compact size and high speed 30km/h RC boat ready for you to have free sailing on water up to 150 meters control distance.
Capsize recovery feature - push throttle & trigger forward then back to self-right the boat.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars41 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
